n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>FCERNY</SCHEMA> <NAME>BSA_VIEW_PROJECT_TOOL</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>TOOL_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>TOOLDESCRIPTION</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>DATEPURCHASED</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>TOTALCOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>PROJECT_ID</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>QUANTITY</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>UNITCOST</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>COSTBASIS</NAME> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select t.id as tool_id, t.name, t.description as tooldescription, t.datepurchased, t.totalcost, pt.project_id, pt.quantity, (t.totalcost/bsa_func_update_get_total_usages(t.id)) as unitcost, ((t.totalcost/bsa_func_update_get_total_usages(t.id))*pt.quantity) as costbasis from bsa_tool t inner join bsa_project_tool pt on pt.tool_id = t.id </SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
